channel.title: News on Mauro Faccin
channel.description: Recent content in News on Mauro Faccin

item.title: CCS2018
item.description: I’ll be giving a talk in CCS2018 (Greece). Let’s meet in Thessaloniki.

item.title: Complex Networks 2018
item.description: In December Complex Networks 2018 will be in Cambridge.

item.title: Netsci2018 (Paris)
item.description: In June I’ll be giving a talk in Netsci 2018 (Paris).

item.title: Benet 2016
item.description: We are organizing the sixth edition of the Belgian Networks Research Meeting Benet 2016. It will be held in Louvain-la-Neuve, Belgium, on Thu, Dec 15th.

item.title: Complenet 2016 @ Dijon
item.description: This time I’m presenting a poster in Dijon for the annual Complenet Conference on complex systems. This international workshop on complex networks (CompleNet) aims at bringing together researchers and practitioners working on areas related to complex networks. In the past two decades we have been witnessing an exponential increase on the number of publications in this field. From biological systems to computer science, from economic to social systems, complex networks are becoming pervasive in many fields of science.

item.title: NetSciX 2016 @ Wrocław
item.description: Heading up in Wrocław to give a talk on the last work on Communities and Markovian processes on networks. The NetSci-X is the primary winter conference on Network Science promoted by the NetSci Society. It brings together leading researchers and practitioners working in the emerging area of network science. Great experience, it wasn’t so cold and we enjoyed snow, beer, vodka and soups. Here You can find my slides if interested.

item.title: New position at UCLouvain
item.description: Starting from today I move to Belgium to start a new life in an Applied Mathematics department. Thanks to the “Movein” Fellowship program I can now work with JC Delvenne and his and other groups at ICTEAM/INMA. I’ll work on dynamical systems and dynamical networks surrounded by mathematicians and engineers (that’s a big change!).

item.title: NetSci 2015 @ Zaragoza
item.description: In June I will attend at NetSci 2015 in Zaragoza. I’ll give a talk about control over time varying networks in brain EEG. Here you can find the slides of my talk.

item.title: Talk @ ECCS 2014
item.description: In September I will give a talk at ECCS 2014. Obviously it’s on Quantum Networks: Quantum Approaches to Community Detection Let’s meet there. Edit: Here you can find the slides of my talk. Hey, I gave a talk in a church!!! Look at this!

item.title: QNET satellite @ NetSci 2014
item.description: This year I will organize with Zoltan and Filippo a satellite meeting at the huge Network Conference NetSci2014 at Berkeley: Quantum Frontiers in Network Science (QNET) The topic will be of course quantum networks. Come to join the conversation. Here you can find the final program: 8:30AM: Welcome 8:45AM: Ginestra Bianconi Statistical Mechanics of Quantum Complex Networks 9:30AM: Tomi Johnson Community detection in quantum networks 10:00AM: Silvano Garnerone Adiabatic quantum algorithm for search engine ranking 10:30AM: Coffee Break 11:00AM: Leonardo Banchi Engineered Quantum Networks for Entanglement Sharing and Generation 11:30AM: Blake Pollard Quantropy 12:00AM: Tomi Johnson Quantum-style tensor network factorisation in stochastic networks Download the book of abstracts

item.title: Talk @ Complenet 2014
item.description: I gave a talk in Bologna at the Complenet workshop on Complex Networks. A lot of people attended and it was great. Sadly we still listen to talks that show how cool is a dataset with power-law degree distribution. Here you can find the slides of my talk.

item.title: Talk @ Bifi 2014
item.description: In January I will give a talk at BIFI 2014 Obviously it’s on Quantum Networks: Community Detection on Quantum Complex Systems Let’s meet there. Edit: Here you can find the slides of my talk.

item.title: The 6th International Conference on Complex Networks and Their Applications
item.description: This year Complex Networks gains Conference status. It will be held in Lyon (France).
